attributes.action: Cap student loan interest rates at a fair and affordable level
attributes.additional_details: UK student loan interest rates significantly exceed inflation and continue to grow even when graduates earn modest incomes. As a result, many borrowers see their debt increase despite making regular repayments. We believe the current system discourages social mobility, places long-term financial strain on graduates, and disproportionately affects lower and middle earners. The Government should reduce, cap, or reform student loan interest rates so that repayments genuinely reduce debt.
attributes.background: Reduce or cap interest rates on UK student loans so that repayments are fair, affordable, and allow graduates to meaningfully reduce their debt.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to make a clear ask of the Government or Parliament.

We are not clear if you are asking for a reduction, cap, or reform of student loan interest rates. You can submit a petition setting out more clearly what action you are calling for.
